_comment: Created by EFisher on 24/01/2014 16:57:16 using v2.0
title: Has the proportion of people who found it easy to access information about social care changed by age?
analysis_commentary: In both 2011/12 and 2012/13, a higher proportion of social care users aged 65 and over found it very easy or fairly easy to find information about social care services compared with the 18 to 64 age category. This was a difference of 5.2 percentage points in 2011/12 and a difference of 5.1 percentage points in 2012/13.
